name: Wowie Jam! Uncontrollable Spaceship
description:
Uncontrollable Spaceship: The Space Race Will Never Be The Same

The only ship control you have is your thruster. Bump into things with the right timing to steer yourself around. 

Fortunately, you are very resourceful! If you do get stuck, you can throw a hand grenade out the window -- the BOOM! might knock you in a direction you want to go!

- 2 human players only -

The left player uses the "Z" key to thrust and the "A" key to BOOM!

The right player uses the "/" (slash) key to thrust and the "'" (apostrophe) key to BOOM!

Race through your checkpoints in order from 1 to 5 to win!

Check out the youtube video to see how to use bumping into things to steer you where you want to go. Then go out and try the same thing in your car (at your own risk).

Follow along with my devlog for the Wowie Jam! game jam:

https://81766.com/tag/wowie-jam/

Follow along in general and sign up for my email list to keep up with what I'm doing. I'm creating games and learning Godot and I write all about it - with a special emphasis on tools that are free or cheap.

https://81766.com

This game is developed with Godot 3 on a laptop with a Pentium 3558U at 1.7GHz with integrated graphics. So it will probably run on your PC.
